code_value: Questions 1~2  You are going to take a class trip to a park this Saturday. Ask your classmates for some information about the trip.</br>Questions 3~4  Your friend Lucy has bought a new computer. Ask her something about the computer.
Questions 1~2  You are going to take a class trip to a park this Saturday. Ask your classmates for some information about the trip.
Questions 3~4  Your friend Lucy has bought a new computer. Ask her something about the computer.
